page.title: 11Playgroup facilities-K.Lynn
page.content: There are 5 playgroups operating within our area.Three of them are community groups,one is private and the fifth is run under the guidance of social services. The private playgroup meets in the Methodist hall. It caters for 14 children between the ages of 3-5. There are 2 paid helpers and 2 student helpers. It meets for 4 mornings and 2 afternoons per week for two and a half hours per session. This group is not permitted to fund raise and buys all equipment from fees. The group run under the guidance of social services meets at Marsh house(a home for the mentally handicapped). There are 30 children attending,2 of which are handicapped.They meet for 4 sessions per week with 2 supervisors & 1mother helper each session.On Friday have use of special school heated pool
